attributes.action: Force all Diesel Engines to use WVO/SVO/BioDiesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Force all heavy vehicles and machinery to use Waste Vegetable Oil/Standard Vegetable Oil (please see Wikipedia for more info) or Biodiesel instead of Diesel fuel.

Eventually this can then be ported onto buses, trains and private vehicles

The use of WVO and SVO fuels create ZERO emissions.
